metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000520 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description: ARM mbedTLS version 2.7.0 and earlier contains a Ciphersuite AllowsIncorrectly Signed Certificates vulnerability inmbedtls_ssl_get_verify_result() that can result in ECDSA-signedcertificates are accepted, when only RSA-signed ones should be.. Thisattack appear to be exploitable via Peers negotiate a TLS-ECDH-RSA-*ciphersuite. Any of the peers can then provide an ECDSA-signed certificate,when only an RSA-signed one should be accepted..

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
